problems.title: Sum of Odd Numbers
problems.description:
Write a program to find the sum of all odd numbers between 1 to n using a while loop.

Input Format:
A single integer n.

Output Format:
A single integer representing the sum.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
5

Sample Output
9

Explanation:
Odd numbers are 1, 3, 5. Sum = 1 + 3 + 5 = 9.
hintsList: Initialize a sum variable to 0 and a counter to 1.
Check if counter is odd, if so add to sum.
